overview: Markus L. Frank leads the Dessau Anhalt Theater Children's Choir and Dessau Anhalt Philharmonic Orchestra in this 2007 performance of Engelbert Humperdinck's opera 'Hansel and Gretel' at the Anhaltisches Theatre, Dessau. Sabine Noack and Cornelia Marschall perform in the title roles.
title: Hansel and Gretel - Anhaltisches Theater
